Ivory Tower Wizard Rombel:
Cough cough... Okay.
Go to the 2nd floor of the Tower the Marshlands. There, kill the monsters following species: Monarch of Darkness, Knight of Darkness, Soldiers of Darkness, the Eye of Destruction, Perum, Liangma, Azerad, Strinda, Ascende. Take their Life Energy, 20 PCs. it can help to repair the device.
But I'm not a repair technician magical mechanisms. When collect the Energy of Life, go to the 2nd floor of the Tower the Marshlands and find the Magician of the Ivory Tower Belkadi.
